predicate.note: Frames file for 'penetrate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: cloak and dagger
example.text: He probably didn't penetrate any top-secret files, but the KGB in East Berlin was willing to pay two of his associates, Peter Carl and Dirk Brezinski, $15,000 for some of the material Hess collected.

example.name: passive, unclear meaning to me
example.text: ``The collar was penetrated *trace* on a number of occasions, ''meaning securities firms figured out ways to conduct program trades to circumvent the collar and use the Big Board's electronic trading system, Mr. Phelan said.
example.arg: meaning securities firms figured out ways to conduct program trades to circumvent the collar and use the Big Board's electronic trading system
